content: क्षुद्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [क्षुद्-कर्तरि रक्] (<ab>compar.</ab> क्षोदीयस्; <ab>superl.</ab> क्षोदिष्ठ) {@--1@} Minute, small, tiny, little, trifling. {@--2@} Mean, low, vile, base; क्षुद्रेऽपि नूनं शरणं प्रपन्ने <ls>Ku. 1. 12.</ls> {@--3@} Wicked. {@--4@} Cruel. {@--5@} Poor, indigent. {@--6@} Miserly, niggardly; <ls>Me. 17.</ls> {@--7@} Diminutive, short. {@--8@} Trifling, insignificant. {@--9@} Unimportant, minor. --द्रः {@--1@} A small particle of rice. {@--2@} A bee or wasp. --द्रा {@--1@} A bee. {@--2@} A fly or gnat. {@--3@} A woman maimed or crippled. {@--4@} A quarrelsome woman. {@--5@} A prostitute, whore, harlot; उपसृष्टा इव क्षुद्राधिष्ठितभवनाः <ls>K. 107.</ls> {@--6@} A base or despicable woman. {@--7@} A dancing girl. --द्रं <ab>Ved.</ab> A particle of dust, flour, meal.
